review.title: “abusive”
review.pros: Pros – Great work, opportunity to contribute to some great campaigns, experience in dealing with the downside of the advertising business (a necessity in continuing in it).
review.cons: Cons – Senior management is disrespectful, projects psychological issues and has a tendency to change tactics so quickly you'll get whiplash. Fickle.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Try a more proactive, compassionate approach that doesn't go from 'best work ever' to 'off with their heads' in 3 minutes flat.
